metadata.description: Knowledge base for voice AI bot

entries.question: What are your business hours?
entries.answer: We are open Monday to Friday, 9 AM to 6 PM.

entries.question: How can I contact support?
entries.answer: You can reach our support team at support@example.com or call us at 1-800-SUPPORT.

entries.question: What services do you offer?
entries.answer: We offer voice AI solutions, customer support automation, and multilingual conversation systems.
